website_summaries.verdict: This heavy-duty shelf can easily withstand classroom wear and tear.
pros: Strong, sturdy wooden cubbies are built to last
Perfect for keeping classroom toys and art supplies organized
Laminated birch plywood wipes clean with ease
cons: Cubby sits at a significantly higher price point

customer_reviews.title: Looks great but stinks
customer_reviews.text: Wish they had off-gassed this at the factory not in our living room...hope we didn't kill too many brain cells setting it up in our enclosed room...was very strong chemical smell. It's in our basement now to off-gas...not bad unless you put your nose near it then whew, strong smell.
customer_reviews.author: SSG

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a home classroom, organization, kids bedrooms and much more. Take a while to put together but they are so nice looking!
customer_reviews.author: Nikita

customer_reviews.title: Solid plywood shelving unit
customer_reviews.text: This is not made of solid birch or of "birch hardwood," but of plywood as one would expect from the photo. The back is not a single piece of plywood, but 3 small pieces. That being said, this is a solid and nice-looking unit. I could do without the huge ECR4KIDS logo on the bottom. It was easy to assemble. The packaging wasn't the greatest--several of the plywood "boards" arrived with slightly crushed corners.
customer_reviews.author: Nina S.

customer_reviews.title: Questionable Quality Control
customer_reviews.text: The first one I ordered was great. So I ordered another. The pre drilled holes were too deep, so I returned. The wrench provided was not the correct size on the third one. Fortunately I had the old one from the first. I would have returned again but that means reboxing. Otherwise, it is sturdy if you get one with the right tool to assemble and the holes are drilled appropriately.
customer_reviews.author: DOROTHY A CHENG

customer_reviews.title: Not just for kids!
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this sturdy piece of furniture. There was a need for a shelf that was of a certain size, and I wanted something not only to fill a very specific space but to be made of real wood and to handle maybe being sat upon. The sturdiness is impressive, as it is quite heavy and solid. Assembly was a bit tricky because you have to REALLY pay attention to every single little detail in instruction diagrams. But it all makes sense and the shelf accommodates big books (sideways) as well as other random things I needed to put away. I left off the casters to make it closer to the ground and lower and more stable.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping for good quality. Mine arrived with splinters is wood all over the edges and gouges in many of the shelves. I also received no directions on how to put it together. I sent it back. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: ReviewPro2000

customer_reviews.title: These have made a great addition to our nursery
customer_reviews.text: These have made a great addition to our nursery. They are solid and I love the option for casters. I wish the shelving was a little taller, but they work great for little books and toys. We just put the tall books on their side for now.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Anastasi

customer_reviews.title: Bad instructions - a pain to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to assemble due to poor instructions. The graphics do not match the product well and it is hard to tell which direction things go. After 45 minutes we gave up on a VERY expensive cart. The quality of wood doesn't matter if we can't assemble right. The center shelf with divider doesn't screw in tight. Now I have to go look on YouTube and look for a tutorial. I have put many flat box /IKEA furniture together. I recommend they fix their instructions, I won't be buying the matching set from them at this time.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Sorenson

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Simple
customer_reviews.text: This Cart is very sturdy and was simple to put together. I originally did not want to put the wheels on the bottom because I did not think they would look very nice in my home. I did wind up putting the wheels on though because I think that the bottom of the cart would have scratched my wood floors without the wheels. The wheels are hidden below the bottom of the cart and do not look bad at all. Overall, I am very happy with this cart.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty and great for organizing
customer_reviews.text: Small and perfect for our small bedroom. Easy to assemble. Sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Piece- good value
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy piece and was not difficult to put together.
customer_reviews.author: J. Fishburne

customer_reviews.title: Excellent.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! Perfect and solid. Love the baskets too. Such a good little bookshelf.
customer_reviews.author: Attorney Chick Texas

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our needs
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter can reach all the shelves and enjoys taking things out AND putting them away. :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our little homeschool class and I live it! Perfect little display cubbies.
customer_reviews.author: NKing

customer_reviews.title: It is very sturdy and holds quite a bit of things
customer_reviews.text: Bought this bookshelf for home use of storing toys where the boys could see them. It is very sturdy and holds quite a bit of things. Highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: scott s.

customer_reviews.title: Great size
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Lots of room! Using it in block center.
customer_reviews.author: karen

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I looked for a long time to find shelving this size, and I couldn't be happier. It fits the space in my son's room perfectly, and he uses it to display his legos. It's nice that it's not too deep. It's very sturdy and was easy to put together. I didn't use the casters, as we don't plan to move it around, so I only wish there was an option to order it with or without the casters.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Finely Crafted
customer_reviews.text: Finely crafted, good quality wood and easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: It's a nice size, very well made
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my Kindergarten classroom. It's a nice size, very well made, portable, and does a great job of keeping our blocks organized.
customer_reviews.author: Janet M.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and just the right size for my 7 month old to reach his toys.
customer_reviews.author: lisa-marie murtagh

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and solid wood
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and solid wood. We didn't put the wheels in at first but they really came in handy. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Simple and clean looking.
customer_reviews.text: This book case is well constructed and perfect for kids play area. I took off a star bc it was not so simple to put together. More tedious than difficult, but the instructions could have been better.
customer_reviews.author: Rosa D

customer_reviews.title: Very clean looking and very sturdy. It's not as big as it looks
customer_reviews.text: Very clean looking and very sturdy. It's not as big as it looks, though. It came in a lot of pieces and was not easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: dg

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. We use it for my granddaughter's play kitchen supplies.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Dye

customer_reviews.title: So happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love, such good quality - really happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Multiuse shelf
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and attractive addition to my classroom. I used it for puzzles and games. Definitely a multiuse shelf
customer_reviews.author: C. Owens

customer_reviews.title: Well made and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Well made! This shelf is a steal for the price!
customer_reviews.author: elisabeth green

customer_reviews.title: but it's a great design for smaller items
customer_reviews.text: Compartments are a bit small, but it's a great design for smaller items.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: great seller, item arrived on time and was as described. thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are great! Very durable and well worth the price. We have 3 different sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly R.

customer_reviews.title: Very HAPPY with our Block storage shelf
customer_reviews.text: Very HAPPY with our Block storage shelf.. Easy to put together. Very strong n durable shelf! Will 4sure purchase again ECR4kids products 😊
customer_reviews.author: Klirvin

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Difficult time putting it together as not everything lined up the way it was supposed to. Began splintering as soon as we got it out of the box! Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: kelly leonard

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is for the person who asked for the instructions I hope this is the one that you was needing
customer_reviews.author: reba 70

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't make it for the price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these shelves to use in a Godly Play Sunday school set up. They are sturdy and beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Nanalinda

product_meta.title: ECR4Kids Birch 48 in Large Cubby Block Storage Unit with Rolling Casters, Natural Hardwood Shelving for Kids Classroom, Mobile Toy Organizer for Homes and Playrooms, Large - 48" W (ELR-17202)
product_meta.description: Size:Large - 48" W| Product Packaging:Standard PackagingPerfect for keeping block sets of any size organized! Multiple cubbies keep blocks easily accessible, and make clean-up a snap when play time is over. Available in three different sizes to accommodate small to large block sets. Designed specifically for use with ECR4Kids blocks. Casters are included for mobility.
feature_bullets: Organize Your Space — durable cabinet with 9 open cubbies for storing blocks, toys, games, puzzles, books or art supplies
Commercial or Personal — naturally finished wood cabinets fit right into classrooms, preschools, daycares, offices and homes
Ready to Roll — includes 4 heavy-duty casters that can be installed for effortless mobility; adult assembly required
Certified Safe — Our furniture is GREENGUARD [GOLD] Certified for healthier indoor air, TSCA, CARB Phase 2, Lacey Act, Prop 65 and CPSIA-compliant. Made with non-toxic, BPA-free, lead-free materials
Overall Dimensions — 48" L x 13" W x 24" H, 47 lbs
Small Compartment — 11.25" L x 12" W x 6.5" H
Medium Compartment — 14.13" L x 12" W x 6.5" H
Large Compartment — 23" L x 12" W x 6.5" H

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars89 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
